meanings.definition: A bright green precious stone consisting of a chromium-rich variety of beryl.
meanings.sent1: She wore emeralds in her necklace.
meanings.sent2: The emeralds sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to steal the emeralds from the garden gnome.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like emeralds, shining with wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The emeralds in the treasure chest gleamed like hidden secrets.

meanings.definition: A bright green color resembling the gemstone.
meanings.sent1: The artist painted the walls in a vibrant emerald shade.
meanings.sent2: The forest was a sea of emeralds under the clear sky.
meanings.sent3: The emerald of the grass seemed to glow in the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was the exact shade of emeralds found in nature.
meanings.sent5: The emerald of the grass was so vivid, it almost looked unreal.
